txt.en: A cry for help comes from near the Wall!
A cry for help comes from near the Mill!
Enemies overrunning the wall are attacking the store-houses! Defend the supplies and secure our siege plans!
A cry for help comes from near the south end of the bridge!
Deeping-coomb - Solo
A cry for help comes from the hill south of the bridge!
Aragorn's yells, 'We cannot hold here, they number too many. Retreat!'
'To the Hornburg. To the Glittering Caves! Retreat!'
<rgb=#FF0000> The enemy has overrun your position. You have lost.</rgb>
'We must hold against while all flee who can. Hold the line Rohirrim!'
<rgb=#FF0000> Aragorn has fallen! You have lost.</rgb>
<rgb=#00FF00>The engineers have completed their work. The retreat will be guarded!</rgb>
Defilers are calling forth darkwater spirits near the water-mill. Do not let the spirits escape!
<rgb=#FF0000>With no remaining guards, the supplies are as good as gone!</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>The engineers have been defeated! The retreat will be risky!</rgb>
<rgb=#00FF00>The defilers have been driven off!</rgb>
'They will soon come through the breach! Prepare yourselves!'
Men are laying barriers and traps near the stairs to the Hornburg to prepare our retreat. Watch over them as they work.
Aragorn calls out, 'They march towards the Hornburg!'
<rgb=#FF0000>Gamling has fallen! You have lost.</rgb>
Debris from the wall's collapse has burried useable supplies and trapped several soldiers. Search the debris and recover what you may.
<rgb=#FF0000>With the guards gone, none of the debris piles can be secured!</rgb>
You must have completed the 'Deeping Wall' battle.
<rgb=#00FF00>The Rohirrim will be able to bring the remaining supplies to the Glittering Caves!</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000> Gimli has fallen! You have lost.</rgb>
Eómer's voice rings out, 'They are heading towards the Glittering Caves!'
<rgb=#FF0000>The darkwaters have infested the water-mill!</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000> Legolas has fallen! You have lost.</rgb>
Aragorn calls out, 'Form up the line! We must buy the retreat time!'
Eómer calls out, 'The coming respite will not last long.'
<rgb=#00FF00>The supplies and injured in the debris piles are secured!</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000> Eómer has fallen! You have lost.</rgb>
